name: The One Fish
description:
You must protect your pet fish (the blue square). If this fish dies, you die. Use the red X's on your screen to help guide you to nearby crates; Crates will give you speed, damage, and fish health. Survive for as long as you can ,and keep the red squares away!

Controls:

Right click: pulls fish to you.

Left click: shoots stuff.

Arrow keys: movement.
